The report is not a final report on the IRS Targeting scandal but it nonetheless draws on more documents & interviews than any other so far.
These employees expressed a general loathing toward them even while begrudgingly admitting that those organizations were in compliance.
Conservative organizations were not just singled out because of their political beliefs—they were targeted by IRS officials and employees.
Those interviews were with IRS, Treasury, & Justice Department employees. The report concludes that:
